description.text:
(Translated from Chinese by AI)
0.Fix the issue where the mod loader cannot be installed after updating to 1.2.4.0 
1. Refactor the renderer-related configuration code  
2. Add compatibility checks between the renderer and Minecraft versions  
3. Display supported Minecraft versions for each renderer in the list  
4. Fix crash issues when pressing Ctrl+C in-game on some devices

（若启动器内下载缓慢请使用网盘下载,64位的请下载arm64，不知道该下哪个的请下载all）
0.修复1.2.4.0更新导致的无法安装模组加载器的问题
1.重构渲染器相关设置代码
2.增加渲染器与MC版本的兼容性检查
3.在渲染器列表显示渲染器支持的MC版本
4.修复部分机型在游戏内按下Ctrl+C卡死的问题
